name: StarScape (itch)
description:
This is the winner of a 1 week JAM prototype at ENTI-UB in collaboration with Denish students done by a team of 3 2nd year students in 2016. This is a non commercial purpose project. 

You should try to escape from the space station while loosing oxygen due to a contamination of the environment. Would you go far enough to reach the ship before dying?
